About Us

Community Driven

The stackers pool is a service providing DAO anchord on the stacks blockchain. The DAO is creating several solutoins and leveraging opputunites for people who want to learn ,build and earn with STX blockchain. The stackers pool has an headquater in Yenagoa, Bayelsa State, Nigeria(AFRICA), with supporters and partners from several other countries.

Read More
Features

Services

Teaching

Teaching/Educating folks who want to learn and build on the stacks blockchain, we have a physical office in the Bayelsa Tech hub where classes and meeting are held, plus we have an active discord community where we help and support folks.

Development of projects

As a team of Devs we accept and help peopole build projects on the Stacks chain.

EARN WITH STX

We offer several services of financial benfits such as ,guilding folks to stack STX , MIA ,NYC etc.... plus other earning offers like trading ,nft (well include Friedger and Asteria

NFTs

The stackers pool supports on boarding artists who want to learn ,buy and sell NFTs on the stackers blockchain plus we intend to own our own nft market ecosystem.

LET’S WORK TOGETHER
